channel.title: Need help wid thief stalls

item.title: Need help wid thief stalls
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

[quote=“judgechaos, post:3, topic:198577”]were do u add the

[code]public void TheifStall2(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(theifTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
setAnimation(emote);
sendMessage(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
theifTimer = delay;
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sendMessage(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}
}[/code]

??[/quote]
lol

item.title: Need help wid thief stalls
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Add this void

[CODE]public void TheifStall2(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(theifTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
setAnimation(emote);
sendMessage(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
theifTimer = delay;
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sendMessage(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}
}[/CODE]

Now replace yours with these:

[CODE]
TheifStall2(“gem stall”, “you stole some money”, 75, 750*playerLevel[17], 995, 750000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;

case 2560:
TheifStall2(“magic stall”, “you stole some money”, 60, 400*playerLevel[17], 995, 500000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;

case 2561:
TheifStall2)(“scimitar Stall”, “you stole some money”, 0, 2000playerLevel[17], 995, 5000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;
case 2565:
TheifStall2(“silk stall”, “you stole some money”, 85, 20000playerLevel[17], 995, 1000000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;

case 635:
TheifStall2(“General stall”, “you stole some money”, 5, 5000*playerLevel[17], 995, 10000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;[/CODE]

item.title: Need help wid thief stalls
item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

hey does any1 know how to change these thiefing stalls??

[code]Theiving.TheifStall(“gem stall”, “you stole some money”, 75, 750*playerLevel[17], 995, 750000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;

case 2560:
Theiving.TheifStall(“magic stall”, “you stole some money”, 60, 400*playerLevel[17], 995, 500000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;

case 2561:
Theiving.TheifStall(“scimitar Stall”, “you stole some money”, 0, 2000playerLevel[17], 995, 5000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;
case 2565:
Theiving.TheifStall(“silk stall”, “you stole some money”, 85, 20000playerLevel[17], 995, 1000000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;

case 635:
Theiving.TheifStall(“General stall”, “you stole some money”, 5, 5000*playerLevel[17], 995, 10000, 30, 0x340, playerId);
break;[/code]

the silk stall and gem stalll work…but i want the scimitar general and magic stall to work too…the general stall is for silver stall for some reason…does any1 know how to change it?
